result.title: Sr Software Engineer - Motion Planning
result.description:
Responsibilities:

-Design and implement algorithms throughout motion planning stack, which includes routing, decision-making and trajectory optimization
-Implement test cases and evaluate algorithms in simulation environment.
-Test and debug on trucks including closed field and open field test.

Requirements:

-Master or PhD Degree in Computer Science, robotics or related field
-2+ years of related work experience
-Solid programming and high working proficiency in C++
-Strong theoretical skills in motion planning such as A*, RRT, shortest path searching, optimization method, etc
result.notes: Autonomous vehicle, baby unicorn, industry experience a must
